Porthleven is a small, vibrant harbour town on the south coast of Cornwall.

The Bickford Smith Institute building and spire at the mouth of the harbour.
The working fishing harbour.
The beach and coastal walks to Looe Bar.

Go for a walk around the picturesque fishing harbour sampling the excellent restaurants and pubs.
Take the short walk to Looe Bar lake and the sand bar separating it from the sea.
